main event: A witness reported observing a circular metallic object hovering approximately 500 feet above the ground in Webster, Maine on May 9, 1967.
interesting points: The object was reported to be stationary for several minutes before rapidly accelerating out of view., The sighting was reported by Mrs. Jane Doe, who described the object in detail., Multiple neighbors also reported seeing the same object, confirming its appearance and behavior., Weather conditions at the time were clear, with no known aircraft in the area., The object remains unidentified despite the witness's detailed observations.
witness description: Mrs. Jane Doe and several neighbors
